General.Name: Yeh-Chiang Technology
General.Description: Yeh Chiang Technology Corporation engages in the production and sale of thermal components and electronic materials China, Singapore, Taiwan, and internationally. It operates through Heat Pipe Business, Lighting Business, and Semiconductor or Business segments. The company's thermal components include heat pipes, vapor chambers, and loop heat pipes. Its electronic materials comprise BGA solder sphere, solder paste, and SMT and semiconductor flux products. The company is also involved in the production and sale of lighting equipment, semiconductor packaging wires, solder balls, and bumping products; manufacture and sale of LED products; and international trade activities. It serves original equipment manufacturers of computing systems and electronic devices; semiconductor companies; manufacturers using SMT processes; manufacturers requiring thermal solutions; thermal module design and manufacturing companies; and system houses that require cooling technologies. Yeh Chiang Technology Corporation was incorporated in 1994 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

2.Name: Ms. Ya-Chiu  Chu
